gravestones.cannot_open_wrong_player: This gravestone can only be interacted with by its owner, %s!
configs.gravestones.aesthetic_gravestone: Whether or not aesthetic gravestones can be crafted for building purposes
configs.gravestones.decay_with_time.tool: Whether or not gravestones are damaged over time
configs.gravestones.decay_with_deaths.to: Whether or not gravestones are damaged from further deaths
configs.gravestones.decay_time.tooltip: The amount of time it takes for gravestones to be damaged by time (if enabled)
configs.gravestones.decay_time_type.tool: Whether decay time is based on real-world time (Real Time), or time the server is active (Ticks). Gravestone decay will occur regardless of whether chunks are loaded
configs.gravestones.store_experience.too: Whether or not graves store experience. If not, experience is dropped on the ground on death
configs.gravestones.experience_cap.toolt: Whether or not graves have a limit to how much experience they can store. This limit is the same as with vanilla deaths (100 points)
configs.gravestones.experience_kept.tool: How experience kept on death is calculated. Either no experience is lost, a fraction is kept, or it uses the vanilla calculation (7 * current level)
configs.gravestones.experience_decay.too: Whether or not grave decay affects the experience stored in the grave (if enabled). If so, experience dropped is divided by the decay stage (stage 1 drops 100%, stage 2 drops 50%, and stage 3 drops 33%)
configs.gravestones.gravestone_accessibl: Whether or not players who aren't the owner are prevented from accessing a grave's items
configs.gravestones.spawn_gravestone_ske: Whether or not gravestones spawn skeletons when their owner is near
configs.gravestones.broadcast_collect_in: Whether or not grave collection is broadcasted in chat
configs.gravestones.broadcast_coordinate: Whether or not the coordinates of placed graves are broadcasted in chat
configs.gravestones.console_info.tooltip: Whether or not highly detailed information about graves is recorded in console. This is mostly just for debugging!
configs.gravestones.time_format.tooltip: The format of the death time shown on gravestones
